node.title: Noel loves vintage cars — but his EV now takes pride of place in his garage
node.alt: Noel Mcintosh standing in between a1937 Bentley and a modern Tesla.
node.description: A growing number of Australian car lovers are turning to electric vehicles — but experts and industry figures say more can be done to encourage uptake and lower prices.
node.content:
["Noel McIntosh has had a lifelong love of vintage cars, but his electric vehicle now takes pride of place in his garage.", "The experienced long-distance driver has driven from London to Vladivostok\u00a0and has even been around Australia in a 1913 Rolls Royce.\u00a0", "A former mechanical engineer, his EV sits\u00a0alongside his 1936 Riley and his 1937 Bentley.", "Now he regularly drives it\u00a0between Sydney and Melbourne, charging it about four times along the way.", "\"We got into the EV because my wife and I are both computer nerds, and we really enjoyed looking at a Tesla, which is sort of half computer and half car,\" he said.", "", "
Noel pictured in Moscow in 1996.(Supplied)
", "Mr McIntosh is one of a growing number of car lovers embracing electric vehicles.", "Australians purchased more than 8,600 electric vehicles in the first six months of 2021, exceeding the number sold in 2020.", "The environmental aspect was a key reason Melbourne resident Lena bought her electric car.\u00a0", "She's had it for\u00a0just three weeks.", "\"The cars of the future are going to be like this. So I thought, why not try it?\" she said.\u00a0", "\"I absolutely love it.\"", "", "
Lena said she has to plan her trips to make sure she has enough battery.(ABC News: Amy Bainbridge)
", "But she said it was a \"very, very\u00a0big\" decision to buy an electric vehicle.", "\"Especially with having to come here to charge until I get my home charger,\" she told the ABC at an electric vehicle charging station near a shopping centre. \u00a0", "\"You have to plan your trips and make sure you've got enough battery.\"", "
Tackling\u00a0'range anxiety'\u00a0\u00a0
", "Marty Andrews, the chief executive of Chargefox, Australia's largest electric vehicle charging network, said consumer\u00a0worry about where and when they could\u00a0charge their EV was a key factor\u00a0hampering growth.\u00a0", "It has been dubbed \"range anxiety\".\u00a0", "", "
Marty Andrews says high prices and a lack of charging infrastructure have contributed to the slow uptake.(ABC News: Amy Bainbridge)
", "\"There are three reasons why EV uptake has been slow in Australia,\" he said.\u00a0 \"The first one is the choice of models for consumers.\u00a0", "\"Another is just the price of the vehicles. [They're] very expensive, but are slowly coming down.\u00a0", "\"And third is just a lack of infrastructure for EV owners to be able to use to charge their vehicles on the road.\"", "The Federal Government's Future Fuels strategy, announced last week, included more investment in charging infrastructure.\u00a0", "The government's announcement did not include subsidies on electric vehicles, something Mr Andrews said should be considered.", "\"Whether it's tax relief or rebates [or] even emission standards to encourage the manufacturers to balance out their sales of combustion engine vehicles and electric vehicles,\" he said", "\"There's certainly an opportunity to provide some emission standards to the manufacturers for the Australian fleet.", "\"That would make a huge difference to bring\u00a0more choice to Australia, and probably put downward pressure on pricing.\"", "Professor Renate Egan, from the University of New South Wales Centre for Advanced Photovoltaics, said she wasn't convinced subsidies were the answer.\u00a0", "", "
Professor Renate Egan said subsidies on electric vehicles would make a \"huge difference\".(ABC News: Chris Taylor)
", "But she wanted\u00a0to see\u00a0disincentives, such as additional taxes, removed.\u00a0", "\"It needs to be made easier, not harder,\" Professor Egan said.", "\"But that's not the end of the market, whether large volumes are going to happen.", "\"What will drive it is when a lower-cost car is available to the $20,000 to $30,000 range.\"", "
'Urgent action' needed on emissions
", "Professor Egan said there were other measures the government could take to encourage EV uptake.", "She listed:\u00a0", "And with that, experts predict prices will go down, eventually.", "", "
The industry says improving charging infrastructure around the country is key to encouraging EV uptake.(ABC News: Amy Bainbridge)
", "\"It's going to take probably 10 years before half the new cars are electric, with a little bit of policy incentives and some market drivers, we could bring that forward,\" Professor Egan said.\u00a0", "\"As soon as we start to get a decent market size, then we will attract more car manufacturers.\u00a0", "\"There'll be a bigger market, more demand. The price will come down as the supply grows.\"", "
Hybrid cars prove popular\u00a0
", "Matt McLeod, the\u00a0manager of future technologies and mobility at Toyota,\u00a0acknowledges Australia's electric vehicle market is relatively small compared to the rest of the world.", "Toyota sold\u00a050,000\u00a0hybrids last year and has sold\u00a0220,000 hybrid electric vehicles in Australia since their inception.", "Mr McLeod said the company planned to\u00a0increase its local EV range by 2025 and would welcome incentives to encourage more Australians to buy hybrids and EVs.", "", "
Beyhad Jafari said other countries with EV-supportive policies in place received better, newer models first.(ABC News: Chris Taylor)
", "Beyhad Jafari from the Electric Vehicle Council said addressing emissions was extremely important for Australia.", "\"They continue to make cheaper, more powerful, more efficient electric vehicles, but those countries with positive policies with proper standards receive those cars first.\u00a0", "\"Then Australian consumers are left waiting.\"\u00a0", "In July last year, the Federal Chamber of Automotive Industries (FCAI) announced a new industry-led reporting system, outlining industry CO2 emissions reduction targets by 2030.", "It sets out a voluntary standard for the car industry.\u00a0", "
Converting vintage cars to EVs
", "Noel McIntosh supports the EV retrofitting of vintage cars and says it will help give them a longer life and even make them more affordable.", "", "
Noel McIntosh says many vintage car enthusiasts are taking action to reduce their carbon output.(ABC News: Mary Lloyd)
", "He sold his vintage Rolls Royce earlier this year to a young financier.", "\"I was instructing him on how to look after the engine and do this and do that. And he said, 'Listen, mate, if the engine blows up, I'm just putting an EV into it'.\"", "Mr McIntosh said it could\u00a0be difficult and expensive to source the parts to fix vintage cars.", "He believed retrofitting would\u00a0become more common.", "\"I don't see that in five years' time, people will want to scrap these cars if they can convert them to EVs,\" he said.", "\"The cost to restore an engine on this Bentley is probably $50,000. \u00a0", "\"There are only about four or five people in Australia that do it, they've got a waiting list of two years and then you've still got a year after that.\u00a0", "\"But If somebody knocks on your door and said, 'I can [do it] for\u00a0maybe $30,000', I'm sure the youngsters are going to jump at it.\""]
